DOC.brief_summary: Oral supplementation Neo40 ( TM ) , nitrate lozenge , reduce blood pressure healthy adult clinical prehypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Study Effects Oral Nitric Oxide Supplement Blood Pressure Prehypertensive Adults
